attributes.action: Cornwall Disabled and O A P`s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the hardships caused to the elderly, the disabled, and everyone else, by the highly paid Fuel tanker drivers holding the country to ransom,
Sack them all, bring the brave Military Service Personnel home from Iraq and Afghanistan, give them a Tanker to drive !   Invest the money saved in the Fire Service and Hospitals !

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
